text: Reginald Noble better known by his stage name Redman (born April 17, 1970) is an American rapper and actor. He rose to fame in the early 1990s as an artist on the Def Jam label. He is known for his work with Method Man as one-half of the rap duo Method Man & Redman. Method Man & Redman both had starring roles in movies and sitcoms. == Discography == * Whut? Thee Album (1992) * Dare Iz a Darkside (1994) * Muddy Waters (1996) * Doc's da Name 2000 (1998) * Malpractice (2001) * Red Gone Wild (2007) == Other websites == * His Official Website Category:Rappers from New Jersey Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from New Jersey Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:American movie actors
title: Redman (rapper)
